    • Method Detail

      • getFile

        public Optional<File> getFile()
        Description copied from interface: NucleotideFastaFileDataStore
        Get the actual File that this datastore wraps. Note, because of datastore filtering and other decorators, the file may contain additional reads not present in this datastore and the NucleotideFastaRecords that are present, may not match 100% to the input file. It is also possible that this file uses some kind of compression that this datastore knows how to decompress.
        Specified by:
        getFile in interface NucleotideFastaFileDataStore
        Returns:
        an Optional File, if it is known.

      • asSequenceDataStore

        public NucleotideSequenceDataStore asSequenceDataStore()
        Description copied from interface: FastaDataStore
        Return a new DataStore is a "view" of just the Sequences from this datastore. This Fasta DataStore is the backing datastore so all calls to the returned Sequence Datastore will delegate to this fasta datastore and then get adapted to return just the sequence. When this fasta datastore closes, the returned datastore will also close and vice versa. Closing this datastore will close the other as well.
        Specified by:
        asSequenceDataStore in interface FastaDataStore<Nucleotide,NucleotideSequence,NucleotideFastaRecord,NucleotideSequenceDataStore>
        Specified by:
        asSequenceDataStore in interface NucleotideFastaDataStore
        Specified by:
        asSequenceDataStore in class AdaptedFastaDataStore<Nucleotide,NucleotideSequence,NucleotideFastaRecord,NucleotideSequenceDataStore>
        Returns:
        A new DataStore instance which is a linked view of this Fasta DataStore but adapted so that all the records will just be the sequences.
